data.name: Slender: The Eight Pages REMAKE
data.detailed_description:
No face. No eyes. He's always watching. There's no way out. You are always alone with him.
The chilling Slender: The Eight Pages returns on the Unreal Engine 4.
Kate goes to Oakside Park at night to find the eight lost pages of her suicidal mother. But a sinister silhouette of a faceless killer is already visible among the trees. Will Kate be able to find the truth and how shocking will she find it?
Slender: The Eight Pages REMAKE is a frightening first-person horror reimagining of the original 2012 game.

Features


  • Night Forest
The dark night forest holds many dangers. One wrong turn and you are unlikely to find your way out of the thicket. Soon you will realize that the Slender is not the only danger.
  • Slender
A faceless creature will never leave you alone. He's always there. He's always watching. It's impossible to hide or run away from him. And don't look at him for long! Otherwise the last light will go out and you will be at its mercy.
  • Kate
How can a fragile girl stand up to a dangerous monster? Her stamina is not enough for a long run. Her phone flashlight barely lights the way. And any encounter with the killer could end in death.
  • Bonus Levels
Could you collect all the notes in the forest at night? Then do it in total fog and pitch black.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 920M 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
